scripts.cloudcore:api:local: npx cypress run  --env environment=local --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudcore/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudcore/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh

scripts.log-report-to-file: cypress run --quiet 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
